categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Jorol was a male Twi'lek Jedi Master who served the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard the space station Carrick Station.

Master Jorol appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as one of the endgame PvE gear vendor for the Jedi Consular class; his actual title has varied as the tier has been relabeled over the game's history, and he has been added and removed from various worlds as well. He was later removed as a vendor and NPC in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system. Nonetheless, he remains in the game, as his character model is used as part of the background environment in the redesigned fleet areas.
